attributes.name: Crystalshot
attributes.description: "Your agony shall be glorious."
attributes.parsed_description: "Your agony shall be glorious."

attributes.name: Crystalsticker
attributes.description: "Poke."
attributes.parsed_description: "Poke."

attributes.name: Cultist's Cleaver
attributes.description: "Dozens of hooded figures appeared in the Brightwood's mist, each of them wielding a starmetal hatchet."
attributes.parsed_description: "Dozens of hooded figures appeared in the Brightwood's mist, each of them wielding a starmetal hatchet."

attributes.name: Curator's Life Staff
attributes.description: "All life is mine to protect."
attributes.parsed_description: "All life is mine to protect."

attributes.name: Cure for Rebirth
attributes.description: "Did you resurrect once more? An arrow to the head will fix that!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Did you resurrect once more? An arrow to the head will fix that!"

attributes.name: Curiosity, Greed
attributes.description: "Even in times of wealth, we vie for more. Behind each door is a chance at even greater power."
attributes.parsed_description: "Even in times of wealth, we vie for more. Behind each door is a chance at even greater power."

attributes.name: Curious Bewitched Staff
attributes.description: "When gripping this staff you feel a compulsion to do heinous acts, ideas which are not your own."
attributes.parsed_description: "When gripping this staff you feel a compulsion to do heinous acts, ideas which are not your own."

attributes.name: Cursed Longbow of the First Legion
attributes.name_with_affixes: Cursed Longbow of the First Legion
attributes.description: "This weapon has wrought death and destruction upon hundreds of civilizations. No good can come from wielding it."
attributes.parsed_description: "This weapon has wrought death and destruction upon hundreds of civilizations. No good can come from wielding it."

attributes.name: Cutlass Keys Slicer
attributes.description: A Longsword, given as a gift for helping the townspeople of Cutlass Keys.
attributes.parsed_description: A Longsword, given as a gift for helping the townspeople of Cutlass Keys.

attributes.name: Cutlass Keys Slicer
attributes.description: "Death is just the beginning."
attributes.parsed_description: "Death is just the beginning."

attributes.name: Cutthroat's Javelin
attributes.description: "Give me a name and I shall deliver you a skull."
attributes.parsed_description: "Give me a name and I shall deliver you a skull."

attributes.name: Cutwater Rapier
attributes.description: "The chosen weapon of the Cutwater pirates."
attributes.parsed_description: "The chosen weapon of the Cutwater pirates."

attributes.name: Cycle of Life
attributes.description: "We are born. We live. You die."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are born. We live. You die."

attributes.name: Cyclopian Eye Gouger
attributes.description: "The cyclops is no easy foe, but know where to stick your weapon and it will be blind to all that you may do to it."
attributes.parsed_description: "The cyclops is no easy foe, but know where to stick your weapon and it will be blind to all that you may do to it."

attributes.name: Daedalus
attributes.description: "Fly to close to the sun and your wings shall be scorched."
attributes.parsed_description: "Fly to close to the sun and your wings shall be scorched."

attributes.name: Damned Flintlock
attributes.description: "A standard issue musket for the corrupted snipers. The range is impeccable."
attributes.parsed_description: "A standard issue musket for the corrupted snipers. The range is impeccable."

attributes.name: Dark Angel
attributes.description: "The fallen angel was cast out of the heavens and twisted into a servant of corruption."
attributes.parsed_description: "The fallen angel was cast out of the heavens and twisted into a servant of corruption."

attributes.name: Dark Blessings
attributes.description: "May the Tempest watch over you."
attributes.parsed_description: "May the Tempest watch over you."

attributes.name: Dark Days
attributes.description: "Things will get worse before they get better."
attributes.parsed_description: "Things will get worse before they get better."

attributes.name: Dark Edge
attributes.description: "All will succumb to my will."
attributes.parsed_description: "All will succumb to my will."

attributes.name: Dark Emerald Decapitator
attributes.description: "The dark green hue shines in the night sky."
attributes.parsed_description: "The dark green hue shines in the night sky."

attributes.name: Darkforged Void Sabre
attributes.description: "The dark energies pulsing through this rapier are intense, enticing even."
attributes.parsed_description: "The dark energies pulsing through this rapier are intense, enticing even."

attributes.name: Dark Heart
attributes.description: "What do the depths of your heart desire?"
attributes.parsed_description: "What do the depths of your heart desire?"

attributes.name: Dark Light
attributes.description: "A peculiar staff that seems to emit darkness rather than light."
attributes.parsed_description: "A peculiar staff that seems to emit darkness rather than light."

attributes.name: Dark Marksman's Flintlock
attributes.description: "You don't hear the sound of the lock until it's too late."
attributes.parsed_description: "You don't hear the sound of the lock until it's too late."

attributes.name: Dark Mending
attributes.description: "Let my power heal your wounds and taint your heart."
attributes.parsed_description: "Let my power heal your wounds and taint your heart."

attributes.name: Darkness Defined
attributes.description: "The truest of shadows lie in the hearts of men."
attributes.parsed_description: "The truest of shadows lie in the hearts of men."

attributes.name: Dark of Night
attributes.description: "Eternal night is all I dream of."
attributes.parsed_description: "Eternal night is all I dream of."
